Welcome to SDL’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class api.CellValuesHandler¶

Handler for cell value requests.

cell_keys_from_coords(coords)¶

Returns a list of cell keys generated from a list of coords.

Arguments:
coords - list of lon,lat pairs
classmethod fromcouchdb(cell_keys)¶

Returns a list of CouchDBCell entities from a CouchDB query on cell keys.

Arguments:
cell_keys - A set of cell key strings (e.g., 9-15).
Returns:
A dictionary of cell key to CouchDBCell instance.
classmethod fromds(cell_keys)¶

Returns CouchDBCell entities from a datastore query on cell keys.

Arguments:
cell_keys - A set of cell key strings (e.g., 9-15).
Returns:
A dictionary of cell key to CouchDBCell.
get()¶

Handles a cell API request by proxing to post.

classmethod getcells(cell_keys)¶

Gets CouchDBCell entities corresponding to a set of cell keys.

Arguments:
cell_keys - A set of cell key strings (e.g., 9-15).
Returns:
A dictionary of cell key to CouchDBCell.
post()¶

Handles a cell API request.

URL parameters:
xy - coordinates (lon,lat|lon,lat|...) k - cell keys (cellkey,cellkey,...) v - variable names (varname,varname,...) c - return cell coordinates if true
class api.CouchDbCell(parent=None, key_name=None, _app=None, _from_entity=False, **kwds)¶

Models a CouchDB cell document.

key_name - The cell key (e.g., 1-2).

coords¶

A textual property, which can be multi- or single-line.

rev¶

A textual property, which can be multi- or single-line.

varvals¶

A string that can be longer than 500 bytes.

class api.Variable(parent=None, key_name=None, _app=None, **kwds)¶

Variable metadata.

name¶

A textual property, which can be multi- or single-line.

class api.Variable(parent=None, key_name=None, _app=None, **kwds)

Variable metadata.

name

A textual property, which can be multi- or single-line.
